document.full_text: kirsten dunst won best actress in cannes on sunday for her role in "melancholia," directed by denmark's lars von trier who was thrown out of the film festival for joking he was a nazi and hitler sympathiser.
document.title: von trier actress wins in cannes after director ban
lines_and_colors: kirsten dunst won best actress in cannes on sunday for her role in "melancholia," directed by denmark's lars von trier who was thrown out of the film festival for joking he was a nazi and hitler sympathiser.
